title: See More Volatility in the Curve: DoubleLine's Sherman
description: "On "Bloomberg Real Yield",  Oksana Aronov, head of market strategy for alternative fixed income at JPMorgan Asset Management, and Jeff Sherman, deputy CIO at DoubleLine Capital, talk with Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu. A closely-watched metric in the Treasuries market is near its highest level in more than four years as the 2-10 yield curve steepened this week. (Source: Bloomberg)
